channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Floating Chat Widget: Contact Chat Icons, Telegram Chat, Line Messenger, WeChat, Email, SMS, Call Button
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Floating Chat Widget: Contact Chat Icons, Telegram Chat, Line Messenger, WeChat, Email, SMS, Call Button

item.title: CVE-2023-3245|2024-08-02T06:48:08.511Z -- unknown -- floating%20chat%20widget%3A%20contact%20chat%20icons%2C%20telegram%20chat%2C%20line%20messenger%2C%20wechat%2C%20email%2C%20sms%2C%20call%20button
item.description: The Floating Chat Widget WordPress plugin before 3.1.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
